keep_the_authentication_code: Keep the authentication code in a safe place, as you may still need it in the future.
page_header: What happens now you’ve restored your digital authorisation
you_can_now_options: file most information online for this company without the authentication code
view and manage other people who are digitally authorised to file online for this company
digitally authorise other people to file online for this company
weve_sent_an_email: We’ve sent an email to any other people who are authorised. We’ve let them know you are digitally authorised to file online for this company.
